case.name: btts-t-10-basic-pair-displayyesno-other-rjct-late
case.description:
BTTS T 10 Basic - Pair (DisplayYesNo) Other Rejects Late
Test pairing.
- Other device with IO capability "DisplayYesNo". - Other device rejects pairing AFTER it is accepted on phone.
case.step: PHONE: Ensure it is not paired with the BTTS node device (unpair if necessary).

BTTS: Verify the passkey is the same as the one displayed on the phone.
Get the passkey with:
bttsr agent active-call --get-arg passkey
PHONE: Verify an appropriate message has been displayed
PHONE: Verify it is NOT paired
